description: The property manager asks the RentWise Assistant to remind a contractor about a missed repair appointment; the assistant fetches the relevant maintenance ticket and then composes and sends a polite reminder email to the contractor.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. Use the provided tools to retrieve lease, maintenance, and payment data, and to send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment status, or generate financial reports. Respond politely and concisely to user requests.
Please send a polite reminder to contractor John Doe about the repair appointment that was missed yesterday for Unit 3B.
Let me pull the maintenance ticket for that appointment so I have the correct details.

I’ve located the missed repair ticket (Ticket T12345) for the leaking faucet in Unit 3B, scheduled for 2025‑12‑07 and assigned to John Doe (john.doe@repairs.com). I’ll send a courteous reminder now.

---
**Email to John Doe**
Subject: Friendly Reminder – Missed Repair Appointment for Unit 3B

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to follow up on the faucet repair that was scheduled for yesterday (December 7) in Unit 3B. It looks like the appointment was missed, and the issue is still pending.

Could you please let us know a convenient time to reschedule the repair? We’d appreciate it if you could address this as soon as possible so the tenant isn’t inconvenienced.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
[Your Property Management Team]
---
The reminder has been sent to john.doe@repairs.com.
